measure.CatchLine: Adds new entity eligible to receive grant funds to provide services to refugees and adds new categories of refugees eligible for assistance.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Adds new entity eligible to receive grant funds to provide services to refugees and adds new categories of refugees eligible for assistance. Requires Department of Human Services to provide grantees with funding for specified services related to housing. Requires department to hire full-time State Refugee Coordinator and Refugee Housing Coordinator. Appropriates moneys to department to carry out new requirements. 
	Declares emergency, effective July 1, 2023.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to refugees; creating new provisions; amending ORS 411.139; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to refugees; declaring an emergency.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Human Services, then Ways and Means.
